text: @senrobportman @realDonaldTrump You GOP are politicizing Coronavirus. You are an idiot if you think trump is doing his job. Obama took aggressive action with the Ebola virus scare and the Bird flu. trump is denying the science and is more concerned about the stock market than American lives.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
